title: W10 update reminders keeps alt tabbing me and getting me killed
body:
How the (f word) do I disable this?

 I have the notifications turned off, AND **Windows update itself is already permanently disabled under services.msc** and it **still** got me killed today and ruined my flippin S score. I'm actually so mad I would literally uninstall Windows 10 **(NO JOKE)** but my CPU only works with Windows 10, it said so on the box the CPU came in and it's also noted in the instruction manual.

Apologies for the cuss words, but I'm actually so mad I'm surprised I haven't thrown this $4k PC out the flippin window already. 

I will do ANYTHING to stop this, even registry edits. Please help, google has been useless thus far in offering a permanent solution for this single notification that keeps happening.

replies.body: Thank you so much. Points 2 and 3 in the article were fresh information for me. It's exactly what I was looking for, thanks :D
